title: Royal Club
body:
Greetings,

eSports organisation Royale Academy is currently recruiting players for 
it’s starting roster.

We are an organisation who pride success and the commitment of its
players. With the end goal being OCS or higher we are looking to expand 
the organisation for greater things in the future. As an organisation 
we want to develop players’ potential in League of Legends.

At Royale academy we value dedication, team spirit and freedom over 
everything else. As we believe that with arduous work comes success, and
the harder you work, the better your success feels. 

We are looking for Diamond + players in the following positions. 
Note: all worthy players will be granted a trial. 

Vacancies include:
•	Top
•	Jungle
•	Mid

We are also looking for gameplay analysts and coaches.
•	Coach
•	Analyst
•	Scrim organiser
•	Head Coach (team leader)

What we provide for the players.
•	Regular scrims
•	A co-operative environment
•	A passion for playing
•	Willing to learn
•	Ability to receive constructive criticism

What we expect from the team.
•	Self-improvement. Devoting time aside to improve your play. 
Team work is key but ability to lane is fundamental.
•	Stable internet connection and working microphone.
•	Passion for a growing eSports scene.
•	The ability to always perform your best. 

If you are interested contact me @
•	League client (IGN : Prince)
•	mitchell.jarnicki1@gmail.com

Looking forward to hearing from you,

Mitchell (Prince)
